subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush urges 15 nations to set global emissions goal

05/31/07 11:18 AM, EDT
President Bush on Thursday urged 15 major nations to agree by the end of next year on a global emissions goal for reducing greenhouse gases.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Nancy Reagan talks about her husband's diaries with Larry

05/31/07 11:00 AM, EDT
CNN's Larry King says he's closer to Nancy Reagan than any other first lady. He talks with her on "Larry King Live" tonight about the newly released "The Reagan Diaries," her fight for stem cell research, and how she's managing almost three years after President Reagan's death.
FULL STORY
